entry.value: select * from tab_unloader_? t where t.id > ( select t.id from tab_temp_d t where t.unloaderId = 'ABB_GSU_?' ) ORDER BY id ASC
select * from tab_temp_b t where t.id = ? AND t.Cmsid = ?
insert into tab_temp_b (id, Time, Cmsid, PushTime, OneTask, direction, unloaderMove, operationType, offset, groupId) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

entry.description: 更新卸船机数据增量标识
entry.value: UPDATE tab_temp_d t SET t.id = ? WHERE t.unloaderId = 'ABB_GSU_?'
